Description:
Model
Brand: MSI
Model: X870 GAMING PLUS WIFI


Supported CPU
CPU Socket Type CPU Socket Type: AM5
CPU Type: Ryzen 7000 Series / Ryzen 8000 Series / Ryzen 9000 Series


Chipsets
Chipset Chipset: AMD X870


Memory
Number of Memory Slots: 4x288pin (DDR5)
Memory Standard: DDR5 4800 / DDR5 5000 / DDR5 5200 / DDR5 5400 / DDR5 5600 / DDR5 5800 / DDR5 6000 / DDR5 6200 / DDR5 6400 / DDR5 6600 / DDR5 6666 / DDR5 6800 / DDR5 7000 / DDR5 7200 / DDR5 7400 / DDR5 7600 / DDR5 7800 / DDR5 7900 / DDR5 7950 / DDR5 8000 / DDR5 8200
Maximum Memory Supported: 256GB
Channel Supported Channel Supported: Dual Channel
ECC Supported: Non-ECC
Buffer Supported: Un-buffered
Memory Feature: Memory Support DDR5 8200 - 5600 (OC) MT/s / 5600 - 4800 (JEDEC) MT/s
Ryzen 9000 Series Processors max. overclocking frequency:
- 1DPC 1R Max speed up to 8200+ MT/s
- 1DPC 2R Max speed up to 6400+ MT/s
- 2DPC 1R Max speed up to 6400+ MT/s
- 2DPC 2R Max speed up to 4800+ MT/s

Supports AMD POR Speed and JEDEC Speed
Supports Memory Overclocking and AMD EXPO
Supports Dual-Channel mode
Supports Non-ECC, Un-buffered memory
Supports CUDIMM, Clock Driver bypass mode only*

* CUDIMM support and POR boot frequency may vary by CPU series, with manual overclocking available after boot. Certain CPUs may fail to boot, but future BIOS updates will improve compatibility.


Expansion Slots
PCI Express 5.0 x16: PCI_E1 Gen PCIe 5.0 supports up to x16 (From CPU)
PCI Express x4: PCI_E4 Gen PCIe 4.0 supports up to x4 (From Chipset)
PCI Express x1: PCI_E2 Gen PCIe 3.0 supports up to x1 (From Chipset)
PCI_E3 Gen PCIe 3.0 supports up to x1 (From Chipset)
Other Slots: PCI_E1 slot
- Supports PCIe 5.0 x16 (For Ryzen 9000/ 7000 Series processors)
- Supports PCIe 4.0 x8 (For Ryzen 8700/ 8600/ 8400 Series processors)
- Supports PCIe 4.0 x4 (For Ryzen 8500/ 8300 Series processor)

* PCI_E4 slot will run at x2 speed when installing M.2 SSD in the M2_3 slot.


Storage Devices
Serial ATA (SATA) Serial ATA (SATA): 4 x SATA 6Gb/s
M.2: 3x M.2
M.2_1 Source (From CPU) supports up to PCIe 5.0 x4, supports 2280/2260 devices
M.2_2 Source (From Chipset) supports up to PCIe 4.0 x4, supports 22110/2280 devices
M.2_3 Source (From Chipset) supports up to PCIe 4.0 x2, supports 2280/2260 devices

M2_1 slot
- Supports up to PCIe 5.0 x4 (For Ryzen 9000/ 7000 Series processors)
- Supports up to PCIe 4.0 x4 (For Ryzen 8000 Series processors)

*Please refer to the manual for M.2 SSD heatsink restrictions.
SATA RAID: Supports RAID 0 and RAID 1 for M.2 NVMe storage devices


Onboard Audio
Audio Chipset Audio Chipset: Realtek ALC897
Audio Channels Audio Channels: 7.1 Channels


Onboard LAN
LAN Chipset: Realtek 8126VB 5G LAN
Max LAN Speed: 5Gbps
Wireless LAN: Wi-Fi 802.11 be
Bluetooth: Bluetooth 5.4


Rear Panel Ports
Back I/O Ports: 1 x Clear CMOS Button
2 x USB 5Gbps Type-A
2 x USB 10Gbps Type-A
4 x USB 2.0
1 x 5G LAN
2 x Wi-Fi / Bluetooth
3 x Audio connectors
1 x Flash BIOS Button
1 x HDMI
1 x USB 40Gbps Type-C
1 x USB 20Gbps Type-C


Internal I/O Connectors
Onboard USB: 4 x USB 2.0 ports
2 x USB 5Gbps Type A ports
1 x USB 10Gbps Type C ports
Other Connectors: 1 x CPU Fan
1 x Combo Fan (Pump_Sys Fan)
6 x System Fan
1 x EZ Conn-header (JAF_1)
2 x Front Panel (JFP)
1 x Chassis Intrusion (JCI)
1 x Front Audio (JAUD)
1 x Tuning Controller connector(JDASH)
3 x Addressable V2 RGB LED connector (JARGB_V2)
1 x RGB LED connector(JRGB)
1 x TPM pin header(Support TPM 2.0)


Physical Spec
Form Factor: ATX
Dimensions (W x L): 12.0" x 9.6"
Power Pin: 1 x Power Connector(ATX_PWR)
2 x Power Connector(CPU_PWR)
1 x Power Connector(PCIE_PWR 8pin)


Software Feature
Windows 11: Support for Windows 11 64-bit


Additional Information
First Listed on Newegg: December 04, 2024
Label: Board MSI X870 Gaming Plus WIFI
